title: Solo Maid

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you may choose to stop the flow of time for all players except yourself and up to one other player. The following day chat will only be accessible by you and that player. [1 use.]
- Grant protection to yourself, gaining Invincible defense and dealing a Basic attack to one random player who attacks you. [1 use.]
- You may perform the factional Solo Maid kill each night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who may oppose you.

desc:
Post 578
*Please refrain from vandalism, stealing, creating clouds, or stopping time while in the cafe. Thank you.*
